summary: Completed comprehensive testing of YAMA+ e-commerce site. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend core features working excellently. Major issues from previous iteration (admin login, search functionality) have been FIXED. Site is ready for deployment.

ui_bugs.issue: Minor overlay interception issues when clicking some buttons

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero carousel (5 AI-generated images, auto-rotate every 3s)
Search functionality - overlay opens, input accessible, search works perfectly
All navigation menu categories work (6/6): Électronique, Électroménager, Décoration, Beauté, Nouveautés, Promotions
Product listing pages display products correctly (Electronics: 5, Électroménager: 4, Décoration: 3, Beauté: 4)
Product detail pages show complete info, pricing, and action buttons
Add to cart functionality works perfectly
Cart drawer functionality (with minor overlay issues)
Wishlist functionality (requires login as expected)
FIXED: Admin login works perfectly (admin@yama.sn / admin123)
Admin dashboard loads with stats, navigation to products/orders works
Newsletter popup appears automatically after 5s
Newsletter subscription generates promo codes (WELCOME + 10% discount)
Checkout page loads with cart items
Promo code application functionality works
Checkout form with all required fields (name, phone, address, city, region)
Payment method selection (4 methods: Wave, Orange Money, Card, Cash)
Product reviews section (requires login)
Dark mode toggle works perfectly
WhatsApp integration - floating button and product order buttons
Mobile responsive design - mobile menu opens/closes correctly
User registration and login forms work
Google OAuth login button present
All 29 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Database seeding, products, categories, authentication, cart, wishlist, orders, admin operations all functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Site is ready for deployment! Only minor overlay issues remain (cart drawer, review modals) which don't affect core functionality. All major features working perfectly. Admin login issue has been successfully fixed.
